row.process: @echo off :SWITCH &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# :CASE "Windows" cd /d "&UC4RB_SEARCH_DIR#" :CASE "Linux" cd /d "&UC4RB_SEARCH_DIR#/bin" :OTHER :ENDSWITCH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :SWITCH &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# :CASE "Windows" dir *.exe /b :CASE "Linux" dir ucx???? /b :OTHER :ENDSWITCH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :SWITCH &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# :CASE "Windows" : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"ucx*") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"exe") : SET &melder_pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "m.exe") : PRINT &line# : Print "&pos# - &melder_pos#" : IF &pos# > 0 : PRINT &pos# : IF &melder_pos# = 0 ! SET &result# = MID(&line#, &pos_uc#) : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : PSET &UC4RB_BIN_FILE# = &result# : PSET &UC4RB_INI_FILE# = STR_SUB("&UC4RB_SEARCH_DIR#/&result#", ".exe", ".ini") :CASE "Linux" : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"ucx*") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &check_line# = STR_LC(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&check_line#,"ucx") : SET &melder_pos# = STR_FIND(&check_line#, ".msl") : IF &pos# > 0 : IF &melder_pos# = 0 : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : PSET &UC4RB_BIN_FILE# = &result# : PSET &UC4RB_INI_FILE# = STR_CAT("&UC4RB_SEARCH_DIR#/bin/&result#", ".ini") :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
